Server.NetworkInterface.Communication

Class RMICommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.NetworkInterface.Communication.BaseCommunication
      • Server.NetworkInterface.Communication.RMICommunication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, RMIClientHandler

    public class RMICommunication
extends BaseCommunication
implements RMIClientHandler, java.io.Serializable
    It is the implementation of the communication to the server via RMI. Created by Emanuele on 09/05/2016.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
